prompts.title: Create a futuristic cityscape
prompts.content: Generate a detailed description of a futuristic city with flying cars, neon lights, and advanced technology.
prompts.creator: AI Artist
prompts.description: This prompt helps you create detailed descriptions of futuristic cityscapes. Perfect for world-building, concept art, or storytelling. The generated content includes architectural details, technological elements, and atmospheric descriptions.
examples: A city where buildings float in the air, connected by transparent walkways
Neon-lit streets with holographic advertisements and robotic vendors
Underground transportation systems with magnetic levitation trains
tips: Specify the time period (near future, far future)
Include cultural elements and societal structures
Describe the relationship between technology and nature

prompts.title: Design a magical forest
prompts.content: Create a mystical forest scene with glowing plants, magical creatures, and ancient ruins.
prompts.creator: Fantasy Artist
prompts.description: This prompt helps you design enchanting forest scenes with magical elements. Ideal for fantasy art, game environments, or story settings.
examples: A clearing with bioluminescent flowers that respond to movement
Ancient stone arches covered in glowing runes
tips: Consider the time of day and lighting effects
Add mysterious elements that hint at a larger story

prompts.title: Portrait of a cyberpunk character
prompts.content: Design a detailed character portrait with cybernetic enhancements and futuristic fashion.
prompts.creator: Character Designer
prompts.description: This prompt helps you create detailed cyberpunk character designs with a focus on fashion and technology integration.
examples: A street samurai with glowing tattoos and mechanical limbs
A corporate executive with neural interface implants
A hacker with augmented reality contact lenses
tips: Balance human elements with technological enhancements
Consider the character's background and role
Include unique fashion elements that reflect the cyberpunk aesthetic
